APLC¶

class aplc_optimization.aplc.APLC(identifier, parameters, file_organization)[source]¶

Bases: aplc_optimization.survey.Coronagraph

Apodized Pupil Lyot coronagraph class

Methods Summary

check_driver()

Checks whether the corresponding driver file already exists

check_input_files()

Checks whether the expected input telescope aperture and lyot stop mask files exist

get_driver_command()

write_driver([overwrite])

Write survey driver file using ‘driver_template.py’ and save to the survey’s driver directory.

Methods Documentation

Checks whether the corresponding driver file already exists

Checks whether the expected input telescope aperture and lyot stop mask files exist

get_driver_command()[source]¶
write_driver(overwrite=False)[source]¶

Write survey driver file using ‘driver_template.py’ and save to the survey’s driver directory.

Driver file is automatically written with “parameters” and “file_organization”
